text.author: Allison C. Morgan , Samuel F. Way, Aaron Clauset
text.title: Automatically assembling a full census of an academic field
text.summary: This paper presents a Web crawler-based computer system for automatically generating census data for an academic field, which is applied to the compilation of a census of faculty in Computer Science.
